name: Evergold
description:
Evergold is a coin collecting roguelike where each playthrough is different.  Collect coins forged from a metal known as Evergold, an alloy created to seal away the destructive powers granted to humanity by the seven magical aspects. Meet a cast of interesting characters, each with their own opinions about the return of magic, and decide for yourself: allow magic to fall into the wrong hands or seal away the power of the magical aspects for good?

Evergold is in early development and therefore is unfinished. During this open testing time any feedback is appreciated. If you want to support the development of Evergold further consider filling out this feedback form here.

Important Version 0.0.1 Information: Press Space Bar twice to skip the intro and F4 to toggle fullscreen. Random Events in Act 2 are not coded in yet and do nothing. Many planned features are also missing such as being able to recruit an NPC as a follower. There isn't anything after the boss of Act 2, if you get past it consider that run a win.
